statment.content: 我叫高飞翔，2016年本科毕业于河南大学，现就职于猿辅导，担任IDE组技术组长，负责“猿课堂”系列产品的开发。

employment.employer: 北京猿力科技有限公司
employment.description: 工作重点：技术团队建设；前端工程化；公共库开发；PC端/移动端网站、客户端应用、服务端应用、跨平台物联开发。

employment.employer: 北京名锐普能科技有限公司
employment.description: 工作重点：承接多家国企事业单位的后台管理系统开发。

employment.employer: 芯易科技（北京）有限公司
employment.description: 工作重点：移动端开发，包括微信小程序、支付宝小程序、H5。

statment.content: My name is Gao Feixiang, and I graduated with a bachelor's degree from Henan University in 2016. I am currently working at Yuanfudao, serving as the Technical Team Leader for the IDE group, responsible for the development of the 'Yuan KeTang' series of products.

employment.employer: Beijing Ape Power Technology Co., Ltd.
employment.description: Key Responsibilities: Technical team building; Front-end engineering practices; Development of shared libraries; Creation of web applications for both PC and mobile platforms, client-side applications, server-side applications, and cross-platform IoT development (using node.js, MicroPython, ect.).

employment.employer: Beijing Ming Rui Pu Neng Technology Co., Ltd.
employment.description: Key responsibilities involved developing backend management systems for multiple state-owned enterprises and public institutions.
Focused on mobile development, including WeChat Mini Programs, Alipay Mini Programs, and H5.
